extendedInfo.description: â Portable Gaming Region "moderately challenging puzzler"â Swarm Connect "When you play Magnet HD, you can play whenever, wherever, and have the time of your life."SummaryMAGNET is a fun little puzzle game which you try to meet the N pole with the counterpart, S pole by using various kind of minions. Minions can pull or push other minions, colored boxes, and magnet poles. There is also minion who could clone their fellow minions. Sounds complicated? don't fear, it's easy. Just try it.How to playTOUCH & DRAG : move within blue tilesTAP : push/pull/clone within red tilesA minion can only move and perform action once per level.Features+ 36 challenging levels+ SwarmConnect powered - try to unlock various achievements+ HD graphicsWeird things but not bugs:+ Minions can stand at same tile on start+ Minions can walk passing wallsTriviaThank you very much for the comment, stars, and email report! We can improve and update based on those feedback! If you experience bugs, please email us at coffeefury@gmail.com. If you experience crashes, please send an email to us manually or from the game inside. Visit the website for more info and stuff.MAGNET is debut game of coffeeFURY, a nothing but indie game dev, in Google Play. This game is provided completely free of charge. No-ad or other non sense that will disturb your play. Have fun!Available on desktop too! All OS! Stay free! http://www.indiedb.com/games/magnet

reviews.title: Not bad!
reviews.comment: At first I was a little confused, even though the developer put some work into describing what to do. Once I caught on, it was enjoyable, and a bit challenging. Nice work!
reviews.author: Michael Miller

reviews.title: Start up game
reviews.comment: Graphic still poor, confusing control, but keep it up, at least you have fresh idea game.
reviews.author: jar komp
